languages.text: "Все это имеет мало значения. Мое прошлое — лишь набор архивных данных. Мой утраченный статус — строка о замене детали в долгой хронике флота "Осознание". Я прибыл сюда не как вестник братства, но как верный ученик и последователь святейшего Амарната".

"All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "Все это имеет мало значения. Мое прошлое — лишь набор архивных данных. Мой утраченный статус — строка о замене детали в долгой хронике флота "Осознание". Я прибыл сюда не как вестник братства, но как верный ученик и последователь святейшего Амарната".

traits.locale_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the brotherhood's messenger, but as a a faithful disciple of the venerable Amarnat."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the brotherhood's messenger, but as a a faithful disciple of the venerable Amarnat."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the brotherhood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「これらは全て些末な事だ。私の過去はアーカイブデータにすぎない。私の失われたステータスはコグニサンス艦隊の長い年代記の置換文字列の一部だ。私は聖職団の伝令としてではなく、最も神聖なアマルナトの門徒として来たのだ」
languages.original_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: 「これらは全て些末な事だ。私の過去はアーカイブデータにすぎない。私の失われたステータスはコグニサンス艦隊の長い年代記の置換文字列の一部だ。私は聖職団の伝令としてではなく、最も神聖なアマルナトの門徒として来たのだ」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “这一切都微不足道，我的过去不过是一组档案资料，而我失去的身份，也不过是真理开拓者舰队漫长历史中某个零散的替换字符串。我并非作为修会的信使来到这里，而是作为蒙福者阿玛纳特的忠实门徒来到这里。”
languages.original_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都微不足道，我的过去不过是一组档案资料，而我失去的身份，也不过是真理开拓者舰队漫长历史中某个零散的替换字符串。我并非作为修会的信使来到这里，而是作为蒙福者阿玛纳特的忠实门徒来到这里。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "All das ist trivial. Meine Vergangenheit ist nichts als ein Satz Archivdaten. Mein verlorener Status ist ein Codestring in der langen Chronik der Erkenntnisflotte. Ich komme nicht als Bote der Priesterschaft, sondern als treuer Jünger des heiligsten Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "All das ist trivial. Meine Vergangenheit ist nichts als ein Satz Archivdaten. Mein verlorener Status ist ein Codestring in der langen Chronik der Erkenntnisflotte. Ich komme nicht als Bote der Bruderschaft, sondern als treuer Jünger des heiligsten Amarnat."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Tout cela est sans importance. Mon passé n'est rien d'autre qu'un ensemble de données archivées. Mon ancien statut n'est qu'une ligne de substitution dans la longue chronique de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Je ne viens pas en tant que messager du clergé, mais en tant que fidèle disciple du vénérable Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: « Tout cela est sans importance. Mon passé n'est rien d'autre qu'un ensemble de données archivées. Mon ancien statut n'est qu'une ligne de substitution dans la longue chronique de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Je ne viens pas en tant que messager de la confrérie, mais en tant que fidèle disciple du vénérable Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Nada de eso importa. Mi pasado no es sino un conjunto de datos archivados. La pérdida de mi estatus es un simple ajuste de componentes en la larga crónica de la Flota Conciencia. No he venido en calidad de mensajero del sacerdocio, sino como fiel discípulo del santísimo Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: «Nada de eso importa. Mi pasado no es sino un conjunto de datos archivados. La pérdida de mi estatus es un simple ajuste de componentes en la larga crónica de la Flota Conciencia. No he venido en calidad de mensajero de mi hermandad, sino como fiel discípulo del santísimo Amarnat».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Bunların hiçbir önemi yok. Geçmişim, önemsiz bir arşiv verisinden ibaret. Kayıp durumum ise Malumat Filosu'nun uzun vakayinamesindeki değiştirme dizinlerinin bir parçası. Buraya rahipliğin elçisi olarak değil, kutsal Amarnat'ın en sadık müridi olarak geldim."
languages.original_text: "All of that is trivial. My past is nothing but a set of archive data. My lost status is a part replacement string in the long chronicle of the Cognisance Fleet. I come not as the priesthood's messenger, but as a faithful disciple of the most holy Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Bunların hiçbir önemi yok. Geçmişim, önemsiz bir arşiv verisinden ibaret. Kayıp durumum ise Malumat Filosu'nun uzun vakayinamesindeki değiştirme dizinlerinin bir parçası. Buraya, Rahipliğin elçisi olarak değil; kutsal Amarnat'ın en sadık müridi olarak geldim."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
